change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescript of address given by W.V. Whitmore entitled: Some phases of the development of The University of Arizona; and an address given by Mrs. Fred C. Roberts entitled: Reminiscences of the earliest days at The University of Arizona. Two copies of printed program laid in.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Founders' Day Program, March 12, 1923 (AZ 267). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript of address given by W.V. Whitmore entitled: Some phases of the development of The University of Arizona; and an address given by Mrs. Fred C. Roberts entitled: Reminiscences of the earliest days at The University of Arizona. Two copies of printed program laid in.
